auth.whyQuimeraSubtitle: Everything you need to create stunning websites
auth.whyDifferentSubtitle: We don't just give you a blank canvas. We give you a superpowered engine that builds alongside you.
auth.instantCreationDesc: Describe your business, and get a full multi-page site in 30 seconds.
auth.aiWriterDesc: No lorem ipsum. Our AI writes persuasive copy tailored to your brand tone.
auth.globalSystemDesc: Change fonts, colors, and styles across your entire site with one click.
auth.imageGenDesc: Need a cyberpunk cityscape? A minimalist coffee shop? A 3D render of your product? Quimera AI creates stunning 4K, royalty-free images with professional lighting, camera angles, and color grading‚Äîall from a simple text prompt.
auth.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about creating your dream website with Quimera.ai.
auth.q1: How is Quimera different from other builders?
auth.a1: Quimera isn't just a drag-and-drop tool; it's an AI co-pilot. You describe your vision, and our engine generates the layout, writes the copy, and creates custom images instantly. It handles the heavy lifting so you can focus on your brand.
auth.q2: Do I need any coding skills?
auth.a2: Absolutely not. Quimera is designed for everyone. You can build complex, professional-grade websites using simple natural language commands or our intuitive visual editor.
auth.a3: Yes! You own your content. On our Pro plans, you can export your site's HTML/CSS code to host anywhere, or publish directly with our ultra-fast global hosting.
auth.a4: Yes, you can start building for free. You get access to our core features and AI tools to design your site. You only need to upgrade when you're ready to publish to a custom domain.
auth.q5: How does the AI image generation work?
auth.a5: Quimera integrates the most advanced AI image generation technology (powered by Google's Gemini 3 Pro Image). It supports 4K resolution, advanced controls for lighting, camera angles, depth of field, and color grading. You can even use reference images as style guides. Simply type a prompt like 'a modern coffee shop in Tokyo with cinematic lighting', and it generates unique, royalty-free ultra HD images in seconds.
auth.authCard1Desc: Build websites in seconds with intelligent automation
auth.authCard2Desc: Professional designs that adapt to your content
auth.authCard3Desc: Change your entire site's look instantly
auth.authCard4Desc: Generate stunning visuals from text prompts
auth.authCard5Desc: Reusable blocks across all your pages
auth.authCard6Desc: See changes in real-time as you build

addonsGuide.title: How do Add-ons work?
addonsGuide.step1Desc: Each unit allows you to add an additional client to your agency account. Ideal when your business grows and you need to manage more clients.
addonsGuide.step2Desc: Each block adds 100GB of storage for images, videos, and files from your clients. Perfect for projects with lots of multimedia content.
addonsGuide.step3Desc: Each block includes 1000 AI credits to generate content, images, marketing text, and more with artificial intelligence.
addonsGuide.billingDesc: Add-ons are charged monthly along with your base subscription.
addonsGuide.prorationDesc: If you add add-ons mid-month, you only pay the proportional part.
addonsGuide.flexibilityDesc: You can increase or decrease add-ons at any time according to your needs.

domainsDashboard.domainReadyToUse: Your domain is ready to use
domainsDashboard.recommendCloudflareDesc: It's easier: just change nameservers and you're done. Manual DNS configuration can be complicated.
domainsDashboard.cnameNoteDesc: To use CNAME on the root domain (@), your DNS provider must support "CNAME Flattening" (like Cloudflare). If you use GoDaddy, Namecheap, or others, use the simplified method with the "Migrate" button.
domainsDashboard.migrateConfirm:
Migrate this domain to Cloudflare?

This will simplify DNS configuration. You'll only need to change nameservers.
domainsDashboard.migrationSuccess: Migration successful! Now change the nameservers shown below.
domainsDashboard.changeNameserversDesc: Go to your domain provider and change the nameservers to the following:
domainsDashboard.simplifyConfigDesc: Migrate to Cloudflare and just change nameservers (easier)
domainsDashboard.nameserversVerified: Nameservers verified! Your domain will be active soon.
domainsDashboard.nameserversNotVerified: Nameservers not configured yet. Wait a few minutes after changing them.
domainsDashboard.selectProjectRequired: Please select a project to connect with this domain
domainsDashboard.useCloudflareDesc: It's the easiest way to connect your domain:
domainsDashboard.manualDnsWarningDesc: Not recommended. Most providers (GoDaddy, Namecheap, etc.) don't support CNAME on the root domain (@), and configuring A records requires additional steps in Google Cloud. Use "Migrate" to avoid complications.
domainsDashboard.clickMigrateDesc: It's the only option for external domains
domainsDashboard.step3Change: Change them in your provider (GoDaddy, Namecheap, etc.)
domainsDashboard.stepDone: Done! Your domain will be active in minutes
domainsDashboard.dnsSetupSubtitle: Configure these records in your domain provider
domainsDashboard.instruction1: Log in to your domain provider (GoDaddy, Namecheap, Name.com, etc.)
domainsDashboard.instruction2: Find the "DNS" or "Manage DNS" or "DNS Records" section
domainsDashboard.instruction3: Delete existing A and CNAME records (if any)
domainsDashboard.instruction5: Save changes and wait 24-48 hours for propagation
domainsDashboard.dnsWarningText: DNS changes can take 24-48 hours to propagate. Once configured, click "Verify DNS" to check the status.
domainsDashboard.cloudflareRequiredDesc: To use CNAME on the root domain (@), you need your domain to use Cloudflare as DNS. Most registrars (GoDaddy, Namecheap, etc.) don't support this directly.
domainsDashboard.cfInstruction1: Log in to your Cloudflare account
domainsDashboard.cfInstruction2: Select your domain and go to "DNS"
domainsDashboard.cfInstruction3: Delete existing A records for @ and www
domainsDashboard.cfInstruction4: Add the CNAME records shown below
domainsDashboard.cfInstruction5: Make sure the "Proxy" (orange cloud) is ON
domainsDashboard.needsCloudflareDesc: This domain needs to be configured with Cloudflare to work.
domainsDashboard.cloudflareConfigured: Cloudflare configured. Change the nameservers shown.
domainsDashboard.sslProvisioningDesc: Your domain is verified. Google Cloud is generating the SSL certificate. This process can take 15-60 minutes.
domainsDashboard.sslProvisioningNote: You don't need to do anything else. The site will work automatically when SSL is ready.
domainsDashboard.configureDnsDesc: Add these records in your domain provider
domainsDashboard.propagationNote: Changes may take 5-15 minutes to propagate

whatIsQuimera.question: What is Quimera AI?
whatIsQuimera.answer: Quimera AI is an AI-powered website building platform. It allows you to create professional websites, intelligent chatbots, online stores, and manage leads without technical knowledge.

howToStart.question: How do I start creating my website?
howToStart.answer: It's very simple: sign up for free, choose a template or describe your business to our AI assistant, and it will create a customized website for you in minutes. Then you can edit it visually to your liking.

pricing.question: What are the plans and pricing?
pricing.answer: We offer a free plan to get started and paid plans with advanced features like custom domains, unlimited chatbots, e-commerce, and more. Visit our pricing page to see all the details.

customDomain.question: Can I use my own domain?
customDomain.answer: Yes! With paid plans you can connect your custom domain. We guide you step by step through the DNS configuration and the connection is automatic.

aiCredits.question: What are AI credits?
aiCredits.answer: AI credits are used to generate content, create sections, translate your site, and train your chatbot. Each plan includes a monthly amount of credits that are automatically renewed.

cancelSubscription.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancelSubscription.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from Settings > Subscription. You'll keep access until the end of the current billing period. There are no penalties or hidden charges.

dataPrivacy.question: How do you protect my data?
dataPrivacy.answer: Your privacy is our priority. We use SSL encryption, secure storage on Google Cloud, and we never sell your data. Check our Privacy Policy for more details.

multipleWebsites.question: Can I create multiple websites?
multipleWebsites.answer: Absolutely! Depending on your plan, you can create several websites. The free plan allows 1 site, while paid plans offer unlimited websites.
